experience: You and DeLeon both know Stephen Williams, Rich Gaski, and 10 others

As a technical recruiter / contract recruiter, I'm responsible for delivering full life-cycle technical sourcing & technical recruitment services to the following companies on an in house contract basis. Areas of focus involves filling engineering and development roles within the following software and biotechnology talent areas: Automated Infrastructure Cloud Provisioning, Big Data, Cloud, AWS, Mobile, Pega 7, Machine Learning, RedHat, Open Source, OpenStack, OpenShift, Cloud Foundry, Splunk, biometrics, computer vision, .NET, facial recognition, clinical laboratory scientist, & clinical laboratory technicians.PRESENT & PAST CLIENT LIST:- HashiCorp (in-house project)- American Express Technology / AMEX (in-house project)- Matterport (in-house project)- Theranos (in-house project)- AppDynamics (in-house project)- Asurion Mobile Applications (in-house project)- Good Technology (in-house project)- Deloitte & Touche Tohmatsu (in-house project)- Microsoft Corporation (3 in-house projects)- Apollo Group (in-house project)- Google, Inc. (in-house project)- MAP Pharmaceuticals (in-house project)- Thomson Reuters (formely TQA / Thomson Quantitative Analytics) (in-house project)- Kaiser Permanente (in-house project)- Amgen (in-house project)- Sony Pictures Entertainment (in-house project)- PepsiCo (in-house project)

recommendations: Muhammad Shafiq
Director of Technology Ciphercloud
April 5, 2017, Muhammad worked with DeLeon in the same group

I am very happy to acknowledge the engineering skills of Shafiq. During my engagement with Good Technology, I hired Shafiq as a director of engineering and he paid almost immediate technical value to Good after a major system 'issue' that no one else apparently could solve. The team could not understand how someone with the company was able to demonstrate that level of hands-on engineering excellence with having been with the company under a year at that time. He gained the respect of peers and leaders of the company after that as a technologist. He also demonstrated great engineering team building skills as he was able to increase the size of his team significantly with very quality server-side engineers. If you ever are seeking to network with a straight shooter, this is your guy! And a great person after work too!

Debi Salazar
Sr. Order Admin Representative, Field Operations
November 9, 2012, Debi was a client of DeLeon’s

Debi was a joy to have as a client. She partnered very closely, listened to feedback and recommendations on the staffing side to better reduce TTF / Time-to-fill for her openings. She also appeared to have build a very close team that worked well under her leadership and were also very easy to work with. I would be happy to work with her again in the future as a client.

Luq Latif
Recruiting Consultant at VIRE Technologies LLC
March 21, 2008, DeLeon worked with Luq in different groups

Luq is an outstanding team player from both the staffing side and client relations side. During my tenure at US Cellular he always had positive staffing results majority of the reports he gave during staffing meeting. His group was very high volume and high pressure continually since staffing for new market rollouts was the number one factor in success. If I recall, his teams were responsible for hiring many field techs, internal techs, many retail wireless consultants that sold the US Cellular services and phone products at the store front level.One other thing that I loved about working with luq was his natural ability to deflect conflicting interests and remain both focused and efficient inspite of these chanllenges. In my opinion, there are not many Luq left out their on the client relations side. He's a top pickup and staffing talent to any company lucky enough to get him.

Tiara Cortez, MSOD
Veterans Advocate and Volunteer
February 14, 2008, DeLeon worked with Tiara in different groups

Tiara was a great colleague to bounce sourcing techniques and strategies back and fourth. She has a talent for identifying unique sources of talent in very niche' technical areas. I wish I could share some of them with readers of this recommendation but she'd want me to keep that knowledge to myself.In general, she had a very good performance track record and I'm surprised that Google let her out of the door. She can work with me any day. Thank you Tiara for sharing 'Best Practices' with me while at Google! Great Job!

Marianne Dove
Technical Sourcer at Facebook and Wedding Planner
February 4, 2008, Marianne was a client of DeLeon’s

Marianne Dove was an exceptional client and business partner during my engagement at Google. She has some of the best people management and organizational skills I've ever seen in a staffing leader. Some people say that they know staffing, but not many say that they get to know the people that works for them in staffing.Marianne took the time to partner, push back when necessary with internal hiring partners on deliverables and kept her team focused on filling reqs at the same time. Google is a very, very hard place to lead a team in filling req due to various internal challenges, none the less she got it done during my tenure working with her as a consultant.She has great attention to detail as it relates to staffing process and various other intuitive operational skills. I witnessed all these things, and my hat goes off to this professional.DeLeon MittsContract Staffing Consultant

summary: Core Industry exposures as an in-house Technical Recruiter:•	         Multi-Platform DevOps Infrastructure Automation (All Cloud & data center environments)•               Open Source Cloud based engineering: OpenStack, OpenShift, AWS, Cloud Foundry,                Mirantis (IaaS), Rackspace (PaaS), Cloud Security, Big Data platform engineering•               Rapid therapeutic blood diagnostic technologies, Machine Learning & clinical processes•               Next Gen Cloud & Data Center Application Performance Management (APM) software•               Multi-platform Enterprise Mobility Security Software for: Android, iOS / iPhone / iPad, Windows Phone v7 & v8, Computer Vision & MDM•               Search Engine Provider & open-source software producers (Java, J2EE & .NET platforms)•               3D printing software design & development technology•	        Consumer Packaged Goods / CPG - Food and Beverage manufacturer•	Analytic Investment Trading Software- licensing software producer•	Biotechnology & Pharmaceutical - drug delivery, analytical chemistry, medical device,        & clinical operations (injectable and inhalation specialty therapeutics)•	Big Screen Movie Production Company•	Big 3 Management Consulting Industry
